# rsqrt()

**Instance Method**

Computes reverse square root of the tensor’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func rsqrt() -> MLTensor
```

## Discussion

The reverse square root operation is the reciprocal of the square root.

## Computing the exponent, pow and square root

- **exp()**: Computes the natural exponent of the tensor’s elements.
- **exp2()**: Computes the exponent with base two of the tensor’s elements.
- **pow(_:)**: Computes element-wise power of each element with `exponent`.
- **squared()**: Computes square of the tensor’s elements.
- **squareRoot()**: Computes square root of the tensor’s elements.
- **log()**: Computes the natural logarithm of the tensor’s elements.
- **round()**: Rounds the tensor’s elements.
- **matmul(_:)**: Multiplies two tensors together using matrix multiplication.
